solution_line_template: There are {num_tables} tables with {fish_per_table} fish in a bowl on each, so {num_tables} tables x {fish_per_table} fish = <<{num_tables}*{fish_per_table}={fish_regular_tables}>>{fish_regular_tables} fish.
One table has an additional fish, so {fish_regular_tables} fish + {extra_fish}xtra fish = {total_fish} fish.
